alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; City of Hyder; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 5:09AM AKST until March 02 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW THROUGH WEDNESDAY... A storm force low over northern gulf coast will stall out during the day on Wednesday. Temperatures currently below freezing with dewpoints in the 20s will rise through the day. Snowfall amounts of 5 to 8 inches have been reported over the northern inner channels and portions of the central inner channels early Wednesday morning. Some uncertainty remains regarding snow totals for the southern half of the panhandle as southerly flow will cause a mix of rain/snow or even a complete change to rain through Wednesday evening. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern inner channels. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall expected through the day Wednesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
